Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Southbound Reroute near Central/Elston
ShortDescription: Southbound 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Elston and Bryn Mawr due to street blockage near Central/Elston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Elston and Bryn Mawr due to street blockage near Central/Elston.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute near Cicero/Arthington
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses temp. rerouted NB: Cicero, Roosevelt, Laramie and Harrison; SB Cicero, Flournoy, Roosevelt and Laraime: near Cicero/Arthington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Cicero/Arthington due to street blockage near Cicero/Arthington.

Northbound buses will operate via Cicero, roosevelt, Laramie and Harrison including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Southbound buses will operate via Cicero, Flournoy, Roosevelt and Laramie.

Allow extra travel time.
